abstract: San Francisco public defender Jeff Adachi calls for independent investigation into sheriff's department following accusations that four deputies forced prisoners to engage in 'gladiator-style' fights for their own amusement.
lead_paragraph: Four San Francisco sheriff’s deputies forced prisoners to engage in “gladiator-style fights,” a public defender said.
snippet: Four San Francisco sheriff’s deputies forced prisoners to engage in “gladiator-style fights,” a public defender said.
